title: The Prodigy
description:
All your life, you’ve held your tongue and done as you were told. Even as an adult, you dutifully fill the role that made you a child star. But you’re tired of playing by everyone else's rules.

Hosted by Virginia Madsen.

Listen to new episodes 1 week early and to all episodes ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App https://wondery.app.link/imaginedlife.

Support us by supporting our sponsors!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
